question: Which of the following forms the core belief of Jain dharma?
explanation: Jainism is premised on the philosophy of ahi?sa (non-violence), anekantavada (many-sidedness), asteya (not stealing), brahmacharya (sexual continence), and aparigraha (non-possessiveness ) which, in turn, lead a Jain to adopt Â a predominantly vegetarian lifestyle.
